name: Photon Flux
description:
Intense, high-speed action!

Photon Flux is a fast-paced obstacle runner using futuristic, high-speed racing vehicles. Compete for the fastest time in over 60 courses, navigating through lasers, wrecking balls, turbines, cannons, asteroids, and many other dangerous obstacles.

Key Features
  • Eight different vehicles (one unlockable)
  • Sixty-four courses, divided into eight different worlds
  • A plethora of unique obstacles
  • Steam Leaderboards let you try for the fastest times

Are you up to the challenge?
